memberdef.definition: typedef void le_audio_cap_cback_t(uint16_t conn_id, le_audio_cap_event_t event, le_audio_cap_event_data_t *p_event_data)
memberdef.name: le_audio_cap_cback_t

briefdescription.para: CAP event callback.

detaileddescription.para: Callback for CAP event notification Registered using le_audio_cap_register_cb

briefdescription.para: : CAP Register event callback handler
CAP Start Unicast Streaming procedure The ASEs go to the WICED_BT_GA_ASCS_STATE_ENABLING state on successful completion the procedure.

detaileddescription.para: State Transition: Current State -----------------> Final State Idle->CODEC_Configured->QoS_Configured->Enabling

parameterdescription.para: : App device list info data pointer

briefdescription.para: CAP Update Unicast Streaming procedure.

parameterdescription.para: : App device list info data pointer

briefdescription.para: CAP Stop Unicast Streaming procedure The stream reverts to the WICED_BT_GA_ASCS_STATE_QOS_CONFIGURED state on successful completion of the procedure.

detaileddescription.para: State Transitions: Current State -----> Final State Enabling->Disabling->QoS_Configured Streaming->Disabling->QoS_Configured

parameterdescription.para: : App device list info data pointer

briefdescription.para: CAP Stop Unicast Streaming procedure The stream reverts to the WICED_BT_GA_ASCS_STATE_IDLE state on successful completion of the procedure.

detaileddescription.para: State Transitions: Current State -----> Final State Streaming->Releasing->Idle Enabling->Releasing->Idle QoS_Configured->Releasing->Idle Codec_Configured->Releasing->Codec_Configured

parameterdescription.para: : App device list info data pointer

: Characteristic for which the event has occurred

briefdescription.para: Configure Broadcast Stream and starts Broadcast & Basic audio announcements.
Start Broadcast Stream.
Disable Broadcast Stream.
Release Broadcast Stream.
CAP Update Broadcast Streaming procedure.
check if app supports multiplex audio
verify requested codec config param
Fill given metadata based on provided ccid params.

detaileddescription.para:
ccid_count
: CCID count
ccid_list
: List of CCIDs
context_type
: Audio Context type
metadata
: Metadata
wiced_bool_t
Note : User should allocate (ccid_count + 2) bytes and update pointer metadata->p_upper_layer_data and metadata->upper_layer_data_length This API will use this memory and will update the data.

briefdescription.para: Handle CAP Control point operations.

parameterdescription.para: : cap application data to be used for the operation
: information about the bass operation to be performed

briefdescription.para: Handle Unicast to Broadcast data Handover, The API expects the caller to have stopped the unicast stream before calling the API.

parameterdescription.para: : the broadcast data which will be used for broadcast stream
: cap application data to be used for the operation
: BASS operation data to be performed after the handover

briefdescription.para: Handle Broadcast to Unicast data Handover, The API expects the caller to have stopped the Broadcast stream before calling the API.

parameterdescription.para: : metadata which will be used for unicast stream
: the broadcast metadata to be used for the handover
: cap application data to be used for the operation
: BASS operation data to be performed after the handover
